DOC.brief_title: A Human Mass Balance Study Determine Total Recovery Radioactivity Urine Faeces Following Single Oral Dose 14C Radiolabelled ONO-4053
DOC.detailed_description: This single centre , open-label , non-randomised study healthy adult male subject . Six subject receive single dose 14C ONO-4053 administer orally suspension . Safety measurement ( ECG , vital sign , biochemistry haematology ) adverse event monitor throughout study . After administration 14C ONO-4053 subject remain clinical facility collection blood , urine faecessamples . Samples analyse recovery radioactivity characterisation metabolites ONO-4053 .

Subject try father child willing use one contraception method list protocol 4 The subject body mass index 19.0 30.0 kg/m2 inclusive . 5 The subject healthy determine Investigator 6 Regular daily bowel movement 1 . The Investigator deem subject unsuitable study 2 . The subject , history , significant disease disorder ( include clinically significant laboratory finding ) would increase risk subject enrol study 3 . The subject history acute gastrointestinal illness 4 . The subject use prescription medicine , nonprescription medicine , vitamin , herbal treatment dietary supplement within 14 day dose . 5 . Current smoker smoke within last 12 month 6 . Radiation exposure , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 , shall participate study .
